name: Oldtime TV  Sidekicks Quiz | TV Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of the Cisco Kid's companion?
questions.explanation:
Pancho.

	Duncan Renaldo played Cisco and Leo Carrillo played Pancho in this very early western series.

questions.text: Who played the "buddy" to Gale Storm in "Oh! Susannah"
questions.explanation:
Zasu Pitts.

questions.text: What word always upset Maynard G Krebs (the sidekick of Dobie Gillis)?
questions.explanation:
Work.

	In the days before "Gilligan's Island", Bob Denver provided nice support to Dwayne Hickman's Dobie Gillis. Maynard would flip out whenever he heard (or said) the word "work".

questions.text: Who played Yancy Derringer's Indian friend?
questions.explanation:
X Brands.

	X Brands played "Pahoo", Yancy's Indian companion. Silverheels played Tonto in "The Lone Ranger".

questions.text: Sergeant Preston's constant companion was an animal. What kind?
questions.explanation:
Dog.

	Preston worked the Yukon. "King" was one of his dogs. (He used a dogsled to travel.)He usually ended each episode by saying "this case is closed".

questions.text: Andy Devine played the sidekick to which Western figure?
questions.explanation:
Wild Bill Hickock.

	Guy Madison played Wild Bill and Andy Devine played his raspy-voiced sidekick.

questions.text: Who played the "sidekick " on the Joey Bishop late night talk show that competed with Johnny Carson?
questions.explanation:
Regis Philbin.

	Joey took on Johnny - and lost big-time. Regis was his version of Ed McMahon.

questions.text: Which of these detectives operated WITHOUT a regular secretary or "girl friday"?
questions.explanation:
Cannon.

	Mannix had Peggy (Gail Fisher), Barnaby had Betty (Lee Meriwether) and Houston had C.J. (Pamela Hensley). Cannon (William Conrad), however, worked alone.

questions.text: Who played Fess Parker's Indian companion in "Daniel Boone"?
questions.explanation:
Ed Ames.

	Ames played Mingo. Ebsen played the sidekick to Fess Parker's Davy Crockett when the series appeared on Walt Disney's tv show.
